label: 皇后宮職
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: established as an extracodal office to serve Fujiwara Fuhito's daughter, Kōmyō, Shōmu Tennō's senior consort. It was modeled on the Rear Palace Office (Kōkyū 後宮) as structured by the ritsuryō codes. [藤原不比等、光明、聖武天皇、律令]
